key.name: meta_desc_user_list
key.value: View {$user_list} users at {$site_name}. Join us and meet new people today!

key.name: seo_meta_form_element_title_desc
key.value: Recommended title length is up to 70 symbols

key.name: seo_meta_form_element_desc_desc
key.value: Recommended description length is up to 150 symbols

key.name: seo_meta_user_list_label
key.value: All Site Members by List (Online / Latest) Page

key.name: meta_desc_index
key.value: {$site_name} social network. Meet new friends here today!

key.name: meta_desc_join
key.value: Join {$site_name} to meet new people and chat. Find your friends today!

key.name: meta_title_sign_in
key.value: Sign in to {$site_name} - Find Friends Here!

key.name: meta_desc_sign_in
key.value: Sign in to your {$site_name} site and meet new people!

key.name: meta_desc_forgot_pass
key.value: Enter the email you used during registration for {$site_name} to receive a new password.

key.name: meta_desc_user_search
key.value: Search members at {$site_name}, and find someone you like!

key.name: seo_social_meta_text
key.value:
You do not need to set up anything - it’s all done for you already. Almost all of the necessary data will be copied from SEO Page Settings and transferred to Open Graph Tags. The following is the list of used tags:

  • og:title - copied from Title
  • og:url - copied from URL
  • og:type - ‘website’ value is set by default
  • og:description - copied from Meta Description
  • og:site_name - {$site_name}
  • twitter:title - copied from Title
  • twitter:description - copied from Meta Description
  • og:image and twitter:image - the same image is set for both tags. The following image types will be set automatically depending on page in question: Logo, Video Preview, Event Image, User Photo, Group Image or Logo, Photo Album First Photo, Photo.

key.name: social_meta_logo_desc
key.value: For the use in shared posts (Recommended image width is 1000px; Recommended image format is JPG)

key.name: pages_page_meta_desc_desc
key.value: Recommended description length is up to 150 symbols

key.name: invalid_meta_error_message
key.value: HTML is not allowed, please enter plain text
